mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( title, content, views, member_id, created_at, category_id ) VALUES ( #{freeBoard.title}, #{freeBoard.content}, 0, #{freeBoard.memberId}, NOW(), ( SELECT category.category_id FROM category WHERE category.value = #{freeBoard.category} AND category.board_type = 'free' ) )
mapper.select: SELECT free_board_id, title, content, views, created_at, modified_at, ct.value as 'category', m.name as 'member.name', m.member_id as 'member.memberId' FROM free_board fd LEFT JOIN category ct on fd.category_id = ct.category_id LEFT JOIN member m on m.member_id = fd.member_id WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
